nodes.documentation:
@title Mintable Token
 * @dev Allows the creation of new tokens.
nodes.name: MintableToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Event fired when minting is no longer allowed.
nodes.name: MintingDisabled

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows a function to be executed only if minting is still allowed.
nodes.name: canMint

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows a function to be called only by the minter
nodes.name: onlyMinter

nodes.documentation: @dev The constructor assigns the minter which is allowed to mind and disable minting

nodes.name: mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Disable the minting of new tokens. Cannot be reversed.
    * @return Whether or not the process was successful.
nodes.name: disableMinting
